main.name: Rajni Sharma
main.description: I offer Cuemath offline courses till class 6th, and online courses from class 1st to 10th. I also offer Maths NCERT tuitions from 7th to 10th grade.
main.bio: I have done Bachelors with Maths as my main subject. Also, I have done M.Phil. in Computer Science. I have taught Computer Science & Maths to B.Tech and MCA Students for 15 Years. While teaching I have observed weak Mathematical foundation of students. So, I decided to improve the mathematical thinking of students. I have found the right platform (Cuemath) through which I can fulfill my dream to teach kids.
main.contactmessage: If you would like to contact me, kindly use one of these options

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
